item.title: FireFox Privacy Script
item.description: FireFox Privacy Script Organizations like PrivacyTools.io and ffprofile have suggested changes to make FireFox more secure and private. These changes cover suggested browser extentions, blocking telemetry, disabling 3rd-party cookies, disabling trackers, etc. This script will take the pregenerated FireFox configuration files and install them in the proper directories on a Windows system. item.title: FireFox STIG Script
